ConfigurationOption.Value: select * from (select am.assetnum, a.assetuid, null locationsid, p.pointnum, m.metername, m.Description, rs.route, rs.stopsequence, am.lastreadingdate measuredate, a.description assetdesc, replace(am.lastreading, ',', '' ) measurevalue, p.loweraction, p.lowerwarning, p.upperaction, p.upperwarning, a.location, a.siteid, m.domainid, m.metertype, (select description from locations where location = a.location and siteid = a.siteid) LocationDesc, m.measureunitid, a.assetid, m.meterid, am.assetmeterid, p.measurepointid, 'ASSETMETER' ds_table from route_stop rs left join asset a on rs.assetnum = a.assetnum and rs.siteid = a.siteid left join assetmeter am on a.assetnum = am.assetnum and a.siteid = am.siteid left join meter m on am.metername = m.metername left outer join measurepoint p on am.assetnum = p.assetnum and am.metername = p.metername and am.siteid = p.siteid where am.assetnum is not null and am.active = 1 union select null assetnum, null assetuid, l.locationsid, p.pointnum, m.metername, m.description, rs.route, rs.stopsequence, lm.lastreadingdate measuredate, l.description locationdesc, replace(lm.lastreading, ',', '' ) measurevalue, p.loweraction, p.lowerwarning, p.upperaction, p.upperwarning, lm.location, l.siteid, m.domainid, m.metertype, null, m.measureunitid, l.locationsid, m.meterid, lm.locationmeterid, p.measurepointid, 'LOCATIONMETER' ds_table from route_stop rs left join locations l on rs.location = l.location and rs.siteid = l.siteid left join locationmeter lm on l.location = lm.location and l.siteid = lm.siteid left join meter m on lm.metername = m.metername left outer join measurepoint p on lm.location = p.location and lm.metername = p.metername and lm.siteid = p.siteid where lm.location is not null and lm.active = 1) X

Struct._value: := format( ${New Value}, test(${ DomainID} is null, 'Numeric2', null ))
:= ${Meter Type} = 'GAUGE' and ${New Value} is not null and (${New Value} <= ${Lower Action} or ${New Value} >= ${Upper Action})
:= ${Meter Type} = 'GAUGE' and ${New Value} is not null and (${New Value} <= ${Lower Warning} or ${New Value} >= ${Upper Warning})

ConfigurationOption.Value: The new value cannot be less than the last value for continuos meters
The reading entered is outside the acceptable range. Would you like to create a work order?
